casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Morris RENKOFF, Appellant. No. 464. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 22, 1936. Edmund Donald Wilson, of New York City, for appellant. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., Seymour Miller Klein, Asst. U. S. Atty., and Myron S. Isaacs, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., all of New York City, for the United States.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
